price: 38. To bazali koloba ete: (Muhammad) nde asalaki yango na ndenge naye, loba: Boya na suratu lokola oyo, mpe bobenga baye banso bakoki kosalisa bino na botiki Allah soki bozali bato ya bosembo.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۖ قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِسُورَةٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦ وَٱدۡعُواْ مَنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna if'tarāhu qul fatū bisūratin mith'lihi wa-id'ʿū mani is'taṭaʿtum min dūni al-lahi in kuntum ṣādiqīna
